data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Narathiwat do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Narathiwat, Thailand

data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the state of Narathiwat prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary: On average, 64 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Narathiwat, Thailand.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 4,862 believers living in the state of Narathiwat. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Narathiwat, Thailand to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Kintaq people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 742,075 who are far from you in Narathiwat, Thailand from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the state of Narathiwat to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.

data.section_summary:
the state of Narathiwat, Thailand has a population of 751,900.

We estimate Narathiwat has 4,862 people who might know Jesus, 4,963 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 742,075 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 154 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 751,900 souls in Narathiwat and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.
